detail_desc: High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a wide waistband and straight legs with a gentle flare at the hems.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a wide waistband and straight legs with a gentle flare at the hems.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in patterned cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a straight-cut neckline, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in patterned cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a straight-cut neckline, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.

Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in a striped cotton and viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover front with ties at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Maxi dress with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Double layered bodice with a lace top layer and a lined, pleated chiffon skirt.
Maxi dress with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Double layered bodice with a lace top layer and a lined, pleated chiffon skirt.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a slight sheen, with a V-neck and wide butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a slight sheen, with a V-neck and wide butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Long, sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps that tie at the back. Small opening at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Long, sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps that tie at the back. Small opening at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck, gently dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Wrapover top, elasticated seam at the waist with ties at the side and a second layer below the waist to form a wrapover peplum with a short flounce at the hem.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cap in hard-washed cotton with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short top with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour trims at the sides and hems.
